title: Namma Flutter | Flutter Chennai
description: Namma Flutter is a flutter community based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, bringing together Flutter developers, designers, and enthusiasts to collaborate, learn, and innovate through meetups, workshops, and hackathons.
mission: To share knowledge, foster community engagement, and drive Flutter innovation in Chennai.
vision: To empower developers globally with high-quality Flutter content originating from Chennai.

features.title: Workshops & Meetups
features.description: Regular hands-on Flutter workshops, meetups, and hackathons led by experienced community members.

features.title: Community Collaboration
features.description: Opportunities to network with thousands of Flutter enthusiasts, collaborate on open-source projects, and engage in peer-to-peer learning.

features.title: Knowledge Resources
features.description: Access to curated tutorials, blog posts on Medium, and open-source code repositories on GitHub.
